A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The film is definitely worth a watch and is highly entertaining but if you think about the film with a critics eye\, you will see some elements that were underutilised and 1 big plot hole.

POSITIVES
+Mark Hamill is fantastic here as Luke and steals the show
+Adam Driver (Kylo) and Daisy Ridley (Rey) shine here also\, their interactions and development are easily the best part of the movie
+Visually brilliant as expected. There is one scene involving Luke in particular that I guarantee will be a popular poster\, you'll know it when you see it.
